Class TwitterAPIConfigJSON

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamboid.twitterapi.config.TwitterAPIConfigJSON
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TwitterAPIConfig

    public class TwitterAPIConfigJSON
extends java.lang.Object
implements TwitterAPIConfig
    Author:
    Aidan Follestad

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TwitterAPIConfigJSON(JSONObject json) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCharactersReservedPerMedia()
      Gets how many characters a StatusUpdate can contain when it also has media attached (it compensates for the pic.twitter.com URL, when it's wrapped with t.co).
      int getMaxMediaPerUpload()
      Gets the maximum number of pictures that can be attached to a Tweet, for now it's always 1.
      long getPhotoSizeLimit()
      Gets the size limit in bytes of photos that can be uploaded to Twitter in a StatusUpdate.
      int getShortUrlLength()
      Gets the length of a shortened URL (that's wrapped with t.co).
      int getShortUrlLengthHttps()
      Gets the length of a shortened HTTPS URL (that's wrapped with t.co).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
